text:
The location... for autumn leaf viewing...
────Fufu... We'll be going by train, right?...

That great.
That sounds perfect for this time of year!

But, mountains or somewhere,
doesn't it sound like it'll be cold?

What's th' matter Mammimi, not motivated～?
In that case, I'll prepare lots o' tasty lunch boxes!

If we're all eatin' together,
Our bodies and hearts will be all warm'n fluffy～！

That sounds wonderful, but are you okay handling that Koga-tan?
We're meeting pretty early... We could grab food at the station.

Now that you mention it, I saw on TV recently that
theres a popular lunch box at the station.

Hmmmm....
Lunch from th' station sounds mighty fine too～!

So how about it, Mamimi～
You get to eat a scrumptious lunch, so d'you feel like going now～?

You know, I haven't said a single word
about wanting to eat lunch.
